turkish_example_sentence: O yalan ifadeleri söylemese, mahkemede sorun yaşanmaz.
english_example_sentence: If she were not to say those false statements, there would be no problem in court.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не сказала эти ложные заявления, в суде не было бы проблем.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O yalan ifadeleri ______, mahkemede sorun yaşanmaz.
